changes: Minor improvements and bug fixes
Implemented more aggressive update checks for PWA
Endless Level System: Game now has infinite levels! Each level lasts 45 seconds â€” meet the score threshold to advance. Difficulty ramps with faster moles, more cats, and higher targets.
Global Leaderboard: Top 10 scores are now tracked globally. Finish in the top 10 to enter your name!
Game Stats: Game over screen now shows accuracy, max combo, mole breakdown by type, and level reached.
Personal Bests: Your best score, accuracy, combo, and highest level are tracked across sessions with 'New!' badges when you beat a record.

Added new app icons.
PWA Updates: Installed app now prompts to reload when a new version is available.
Mobile Fix: Fixed combo system not working on touch devices due to double event firing.
Audio Fix: Improved sound playback reliability on iOS Safari with better audio context handling.
Visual Fix: Fixed combo counter in HUD flickering or disappearing unexpectedly.
Milestone Popup: Extended combo milestone celebration duration and improved animation for better visibility.
Combo System: Build combos by hitting mullahs consecutively! Earn multipliers up to 3x for chains of 8+ hits.
Penalty Cat: Watch out for the innocent cat! Hitting it costs you 200 points and breaks your combo.
Milestone Celebrations: Reach 5, 10, 15, 20, or 25 hit combos for special visual and audio celebrations.
New Sound Effects: Added sounds for cat appearances, cat hits, and combo milestones.
Visual Feedback: Score popups now show multipliers, and the HUD displays your current combo with color-coded tiers.
Updated Instructions: How to Play now includes combo mechanics and the penalty cat.
